DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . ( Exploratory ) OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients stratify accord risk factor , include age ( < 8 year vs ≥ 8 year ) treatment intensity ( whole brain vs focal radiation ) . Patients randomize 1 2 intervention arm . ARM I ( intervention ) : Patients undergo home-based , computerized , interactive training program comprise 3-5 session 15-45 minute every week 5-9 week . Each patient also interventional coach arm I . Patients arms complete brief neuropsychological/behavioral assessment comprise Wechsler Intelligence Scale Children ( WIS-IV ) , Children 's Memory Scale ( CMS ) , California Verbal Learning Test-Children 's Version ( CVLT-C ) baseline , completion study , 6 month completion study .
